summary: MY VEHICLE WAS IN MY DRIVEWAY AND I OPENED THE REAR PASSENGER DOOR TO REMOVE SOMETHING FROM MY BACKSEAT. WHEN I SHUT THE DOOR, IT POPPED BACK OPEN AND WOULD NOT STAY CLOSED. AFTER TAKING THE CAR TO A FORD DEALERSHIP, I WAS TOLD IT WAS THE DOOR LATCH AND SINCE IT HAD BEEN RECALLED AND REPLACED PREVIOUSLY, IT WOULD BE FREE. TODAY I TOOK MY CAR TO HAVE THE REPAIR DONE AND WAS GIVEN AN ESTIMATE OF $233 + TAX.
